review: My soul was crushed by this game.10/10 would break down crying again.
Master of Day 1 DLC10/10 would buy DLC again
My TF2 Experience in a Nutshell:Jumps across the map using sticky bombsGets a kill with a hamshankGets covered in urineHead get's decapitated by a golf club.11/10 would be covered in urine again.

I highly reccomend this to anyone who wants to have a good ol' fantasy adventure, mods allow the player to customize their game to what they want.And remember the saying: 'mod it till it doesn't run!'
